item.title: Crossbow Emote 317

item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:1, topic:345624”]The thing is, I don’t have the emote for the new crossbow emote (I don’t think)
Could you help me?[/quote]Oh ok then you have to add it client sided. I belive theres a tut in the Client Hacking Section. Once you do that then just do what i told you on my last post.

Read full topic

item.title: Crossbow Emote 317
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Ok first get the item id for your cross bow. Mine is 837 so i will be using that. Search this is client.java if(id == 837) Keep on searching until you see this at the top of the code public int GetWepAnim(int id) Once you see that you know your at the right spot. Now under if(id == 837) you will see something like this { return 1084; } Then 1084 is the emote being played when you attack with the crossbow. (It Could Be Different For You) So now replace 1084 or what ever the emote number that is there with your emote id for the new crossbow emote. Then Save and Compile And it Will work. P.S Im assuming your using Delta so try it and if it doesn’t work ill try to help you after.

Read full topic
